incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 02/06/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 06/06/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on the zpool. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will perform filer transfers. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 02/06/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 06/06/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : The replication will be interrupted during the redeployment. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an update on our Zerto service. Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Backup Managed Maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 02/06/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 06/06/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : Backup and restoration will be unavailable during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our team will carry out maintenance on the Veeam Backup Managed service. Thank you for your understanding.

affected_components.name: Backup as a Service || Veeam Backup Managed

components.name: Backup as a Service || Veeam Backup Managed

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private cloud offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 02/06/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 06/06/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : vSphere not accessible for 1h and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the maintenance and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer. An individual communication will be done to inform customers and you can reschedule through the manager. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 04/06/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 04/06/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be replacing Hosted Private Cloud's hosts by new ones. Concerned customers will receive a notification regarding the replacement of their hosts. Thank you for your understanding.

affected_components.name: Managed VMware Cloud Director || ERI - Management plane

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VMware offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 05/06/2025 06:30 UTC End time : 05/06/2025 21:00 UTC Service impact : No impact on vSphere UI, data availability, and virtual machines. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.
